1: <pb/><t>“Chawok'isaj ri trompet,</t> <t>jacha' yuxlenel ri cächajin</t> <t>puwi' ri u tinimit ri Ajawaxel.</t> <t>Rumal rech chi man qui tz'akatisam taj</t> <t>u banic ri nu c'ulwächinic</t> <t>quiwalijisam quib</t> <t>che u c'ulelaxic ri nu tijonic.</t>
2: <t>Quepe c'u wuc',</t> <t>caquirak qui chi':</t> <t>‘¡cakaya' k'ij la</t> <t>jacha' chi lal u Dios ri Israel!’</t>
3: <t>Are c'u ri Israel u xutum ri utz,</t> <t>rumal ri' cätakex na u banic c'ax che</t> <t>cumal ri e u c'ulel.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Man c'o ta u bixic chwe</t> <t>cumal e quicojom tak ajawinelab,</t> <t>e quicojom c'u c'amal tak be</t> <t>ri man xinwetamaj taj in.</t> <t>Qui c'amom ri qui sak puak</t> <t>xukuje' ri qui k'an puak</t> <t>che qui banic tak diosib Dios</t> <t>che c'u u sachisaxic qui wäch</t> <t>chquibil tak quib.</t>
5: <t>Samar,</t> <t>¡man quinch'ij ta rilic u wäch</t> <t>ri alaj ama' wacax ri caquik'ijilaj!</t> <t>Ri woyowal nicowinak</t> <t>che u banic c'ax che.</t> <t>¿Joropa' lo ri qui beytajem</t> <t>rech quecanaj ch'ajch'oj</t> <t>ri aj israelib?</t> <t>¡Wa' we alaj ama' wacax</t> <t>ri c'o pa Samar</t> <t>man Dios taj!</t> <t>Xel puwi' u k'ab jun ajchac,</t> <t>cäban c'u na ch'akatak che.</t>
7: <t>We winak ri' xequitic quiakik'</t> <t>qui wächinic</t> <t>tak cakulja quequiyac na;</t> <t>man e c'o ta na culew</t> <t>ri quequiyac ta na qui wäch,</t> <t>mawi caquesaj na c'äj che ri qui trico;</t> <t>we c'u ne caquesaj,</t> <t>e are tak ri man e qui winakil taj</t> <t>quetijow na.</t>
8: <t>¡Ri Israel bik'tajnak!</t> <t>Ri jule' nimak tak tinimit chic</t> <t>caquilo chi jacha' ta ne jun jasach</t> <t>ri man c'o ta u k'ij,</t>
9: <t>u mac rech chi xbe ruc' ri Asiriy</t> <t>jacha' jun tacalaj juyubal bur.</t> <t>¡Ri Eprain xebuya' tak sipanic</t> <t>che qui lok'ic e nimak tak tinimit</t> <t>rech quebuto'!</t>
10: <t>Pune' ta c'u ne quebuya' tak sipanic</t> <t>chquixo'l nimak tak tinimit,</t> <t>ri in quebenjabuj na,</t> <t>c'o c'u jun k'ijol ri caquitanaba' na</t> <t>qui takexic tak ajawinelab</t> <t>xukuje' c'amal tak be.</t>
11: <pb/><t>Are' c'u ri Eprain</t> <t>quebuwoc jumulaj tak porobal</t> <t>ri xuwi quebajwataj che u banic mac.</t>
12: <t>Pune' ri in xebentz'ibaj</t> <t>e q'ui nu tijonic che,</t> <t>ri are' xuban che chi e je ta ne</t> <t>jun jasach ri ma ta c'o u patan.</t>
13: <t>We winak ri'</t> <t>quekaj ri tabal tak tok'ob chquiwäch,</t> <t>quepilon c'ut;</t> <t>are c'u ri in,</t> <t>ri Ajawaxel man quinquicot ta cuc':</t> <t>quenataj na chwe ri etzelal tak</t> <t>ri e qui banom,</t> <t>quinc'äjisaj c'u na qui wäch</t> <t>rumal ri qui mac,</t> <t>quinban c'u na chque</t> <t>chi quetzelej pa Ejipt.</t>
14: <t>Ri Israel quebuyac nimak tak ja</t> <t>cäsach c'ut</t> <t>ri u winakirisanel pa u jolom.</t> <t>Ri Juda q'ui tak tinimit quebuyaco</t> <t>ri e c'o nimak tak tapia chrij,</t> <t>quinban c'u na in chque</t> <t>chi quenicow pa jun k'ak'</t> <t>ri quebuchajirisaj na</t> <t>ri nimak tak rachoch.”</t>
